#text=I took my grocery list with me , along with some reusable shopping bags .
#text=My grocery list has all the items I want to buy on it .
#text=I selected a shopping cart from in front of the store , and went inside .
#text=I put my reusable bags in the cart .
#text=I looked at my list and started in the produce section .
#text=I put different vegetables and fruits into my cart .
#text=Next I wheeled my cart to the cereal aisle and took a box of cereal .
#text=I went through the store aisle by aisle and selected my groceries .
#text=Each aisle is organized by types of food and non-food items .
#text=One aisle has dried pasta , canned tomatoes , rice , and sauce .
#text=I selected a few boxes of pasta and some rice .
#text=Another aisle carries plastic wrap , trash bags , and aluminum foil .
#text=As I went through the store , I kept looking at my list to see what I needed next .
#text=When I added each item to my cart , I crossed it off my list .
#text=My last stop was the dairy aisle where I got milk and eggs .
#text=When I had all the groceries I wanted , I went to the cash register ans stood in line .
#text=When it was my turn , I put each item on the conveyor belt and the cashier scanned each one .
#text=A bagger put all of the groceries into my reusable bags .
#text=I paid , and then the cashier gave me a receipt .
#text=I loaded the bags of groceries into the trunk of my car and drove home .
